channel.title: WAGJ: We Are Gaming Junkies
channel.description: Welcome to WAGJ, We Are Gaming Junkies, aural nurishment for hardcore gamers from the mouths of two brits. From Old School to Next Generation, from Animal Crossing to Zelda, we'll give you all the gaming info, news, reviews and thoughts about everyday gaming.
channel.generator: Copied from Steve with consent, the rest coded my Ian
channel.itunes:subtitle: Gaming for the ears...
channel.itunes:author: Ian and Nick
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to WAGJ, We Are Gaming Junkies, aural nurishment for hardcore gamers. From Old School to Next Generation, from Animal Crossing to Zelda, we'll give you all the gaming info, news, reviews and thoughts about everyday gaming.
channel.itunes:keywords: wagj, we are gaming junkies, games, videogames, nintendo, sega, sony, snk, nes, snes, super nintendo, n64, nintendo 64, gcn, gamecube, ds, gameboy, gba, revolution, nintendo revolution, master system, megadrive, game gear, genesis, saturn, dreamcast, playstation, ps1, playstation 2, ps2, playstation 3, ps3, xbox, xbox 360, xbox360, pc, import games

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 3 - Episode 3 - The Nintendo Import Rant
item.itunes:author: Ian - Andrew
item.description: A Topical Podcast where me and Andrew discuss the Fact that Nintendo has blocked users from users usesing their Freeloader Discs to play their import GameCube games on the Wii with the latest Firmware Update.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 3 - Episode 2 - E3 Edition
item.itunes:author: Ian
item.description: E3 2007: Didn't go but watched Live Feeds, it was small but OK, not as good as last year Microsoft Conference had Halo 3, which has lots of trees, lol, BomberMan Live, Naruto Rise of the Ninja and Sonic for 360. The Nintendo Conference has The Check me out Channel, Metroid Prime 3, They didn't show off any New SSBB stuff! but did give out a date.Super Mario Galaxy: 12th of November: New Items, Bee and Boo Mushroom. Mario Kart Wii and the Wii Zapper. Sony Conference had Slim line PSP, thinner, slightly smaller, same looking, and relocated speakers; comes with 1 GB card as standard for $200 US and MGS4

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 3 - Episode 1
item.itunes:author: Ian
item.description: Well, episode 1, series 3, and knowing my luck only one person will listen to this bloody thing because there's only me on it, again, I can't get anyone else on, fantastic... Anyways I talk about the whole ManHunt 2 Sceanrio, some XBox1 games I got, a little on a few games I'd like to get on the 360 and stuff about late Wii games.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 3 - Episode 0.5!
item.itunes:author: Ian
item.description: Just a quick warm up podcast, no real "Podcast Meaty-ness", more of a podcast starter for Series 3. I talk a bit about Mario Strikers Charged Football on the Wii, Picross DS on the Nintendo DS, a little on upcomming Guitar Hero games and the funky cool keyboard that I got for zilch, nothing, nada!

item.title: WAGJ Video Podcast - How to Play Picross DS
item.itunes:author: Ian
item.description: A video tutorial on how to play my latest addiction, Picross, or in this case, Picross DS. I'll promise a proper podcast soon honest! And I'll be Blogging on a regualer basis too. Plus I have a great idea for a Video podcast series, so hang around a bit longer...

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Digital Audio Information Thingy!
item.itunes:author: Ian
item.description: Just a bit of info about the upcoming series 3, plus a little bit about my interest on Mah-Jong and some Podcasts you should be listening to.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 2 - Episode 10
item.itunes:author: Ian - Andrew - Emma
item.description:
Last episode of series 2 we talk more about the Wii, about how to receive new wriststraps, talk a bit about Guitar Hero 2 and Gears of war. Emma makes a last minute appearence where she ends up domninating the podcast and sending it to it's ashes

Play free games with the Wii with Opera Browser

Get your Wii remote wriststraps replaced here

item.title: WAGJ Video Podcast 2 - Ian's Wii, and stuff...
item.itunes:author: Ian
item.description: Video podcast again! Yup, I recorded my Wii in action, damn that sounds dirty, lol. Anyways here's what you can do on my brand new console. You guys proberly know how to use this, but I give a under 30 minute summary of what you can do. I show off a few of the Miis that I made and collected from the internet, and I show off a few games from the Virtual Console. And if you have noticed, yes the narration is a bit out of sync, I tried my best to get it right, but I recorded the narration on a seperate program to the video capsure, so... sorry about that...

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 2 - Episode 9
item.itunes:author: Ian - Andrew
item.description: Well, we're between the PS3 and Wii Launch days in the US, despite the fact we consist of a Brit and an Aussie That don't even live in the US... We talk about what's going to be hot and not for the oh so close coming new generation of Game consoles as we debate about the PS3 and Wii.

item.title: WAGJ Video Podcast 1
item.itunes:author: Ian
item.description: The First ever video Podcast, me reviewing Elite beat Agents

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 2 - Episode 8
item.itunes:author: Ian - Andrew
item.description: The Mega pissed off episode... though we don't sound like it... Anyways, we bitch about how Microtransactions suck, how Jack Thompson really need to shut the hell up, and why Sony should burn for sueing Lik-Sang again.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 2 - Episode 7
item.itunes:author: Ian - Admiral
item.description: Me and the Admiral talk about Friday the 13th Wii and PS3 preorders, Admiral gives his two cents on the Beta version of Phantasy Star Universe on the XBox360, and I review the First MegaMan game on the NES aswell as coming up with the word "Animeified". Yes I did come up with that word, WAGJ Pat, Pending, Trademarks and Copyrights to Ian and the Admiral!

item.title: Bulldogs, Eagles and Kangaroos Pilot - WAGJ Network
item.itunes:author: Ian - Admiral - Andrew
item.description: An all new Podcast by the Brit, the Yank, and the 'Stralian, talking... about... er... stuff...

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 2 - Episode 6
item.itunes:author: Ian - Admiral
item.description: Me and the Admiral talk about what games we're preordering when we get the Nintendo Wii, I review 42 All-Time Classics, Admiral talks about the XBox360 F.E.A.R. and Sonic demos and we bitch about the over the top prices for games on the PS3

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 2 - Episode 5
item.itunes:author: Ian
item.description: Welcome to the WAGJ episode.... er.... er... um... Wii!!!!!! XD

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 2 - Episode 4
item.itunes:author: Ian
item.description: Super short podcast-o-tastico! I get screwed because I (hought I recorded a podcast with Admiral to then discover that Powergramo (a program that records Skype) didn't record the convo we had. So I resulted into making this crappy makeshift podcast that's only 25 mins long. I'm sorry guys, I had to do this because I left the podcast for too long, I just wish that PowerGramo didn't mess up on me!!!

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 2 - Episode 3
item.itunes:author: Ian - Admiral - Matt
item.description: We talk too much.... god christ freaking hell, lots of game news and barely any funny, I hope you guys can handle this. We had structured notes and everything! Most organised episode ever.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 2 - Episode 2 "WAGJ + The Brown Masters Show"
item.itunes:author: Ian - Andrew - MMD - SaggyZ
item.description: Collabration time! 2 podcasts mixed for the price of one... Except you're not actually buying this, so... 2 Podcasts for a single download? That sounds better. Listen to the rantings of a Brit, an Aus, an Indian/Canadian and a Vietnamese/American as we talk about how Oz-Land is really an extension of England, Saggy Z screwing up podcasting forever with the worst intro ever using the Moon Masters intro, and make blantant impersonations of Mick-Aloha.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 2 - Ian's Apology
item.description: An apology to Edgar Furse about podcast episode 1: Series 2.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 2 - Episode 1
item.description: Series 2 of the WAGJ, and unforntunity without Nick, give him a week... But Emma (Brittish_My_Voice) and Chris (Broken Record) appear on the show as we talk about my holiday, that I start to forget already... :( and stuff about some games I bought on my holiday.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 20
item.description: Could this be the final episode of WAGJ Series 1?... Could be!? as you're figuring that one out, we talk about stolen DS Lite Blacks, the New Pokemon game, the New Mega Man, new Wii trade marks and teach you guys about videogame lingo. W00T! I PWNED YOUZ!!!111. Guests Andrew/Mr Plow and Mark/Buzzman.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 19 - The Mid Week piss up fest!
item.description: What happens when you Add Emma to the show and a somewhat drunken Nick too. You get episode 19, dear god... I should've barricaded that cupboard much better...

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 18
item.description: I'm on my sodding own again... Nick's watching Footy, Emma was going to be on but is busy with something, so here's another solo podcast.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 17 - Mid-week Podcast! W00T
item.description: Finally! Nick is here, do not fear! Recording stright from the Nick HQ this time with a fairly descent mic. Talk a little bit about Pokemon on the Wii, the actual prices of download games on the Wii and reading the synopsis of games in funny ways...

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 16
item.description: Solo Podcast by only Ian, you "May not like it", warning, no Nick on the show, but hell listen to it! I know you wanna!

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 15
item.description: Blah Blah Blah blah blah... Pretty much a BS show with barely any game news, but hell listen to it anyways! PS sorry for being late...

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 14
item.description: We talk about the Death of the GameBoy, Nintendo DS Lite UK/Euro release, the PS3 core pack lacking in HD and a Review of the New Super Mario Bros

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 13
item.description: We test out a program and a set of new mics for this brand new cleaner audio version of the WAGJ, however me and Nick have a bad tendancy to fiddle with our mics. We talk about Brain Age, Dragon Quest, Me and My Katamari, and how nick thinks I should change my style...

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 12
item.description: Starts off rated E for E3, then it's rated X for gay references and lots of swearing and copious ammounts of flatulence as Chris-Toff finally makes an appearance, listen if you dare! Side-note: We turn Stephen Hawking into a pimp, lol!

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 11
item.description: Hmm... Pre E3 talk, a bit about Animal crossing DS, some PC game talk from Mark (Technofrood) and how video game characters came from junkies of the mind bending material kind... And a brand new segment, Random Cult of the day!

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 10 - The 10th Annversary show
item.description: The 10th Annversary show. We talk about Final Fantasy Advent Children, footy and some crazy videos that we've seen on the net

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 9
item.description: The Crap Game Episode: As Nick Whined at me for rating games pretty high; we discuss about games we found god damn awful aswell as in insight to ET on the Atari 2600, Rise of the Robots, Star Fox Adventures and Sonic Heroes. There's also a little RPG chat too.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 8
item.description: Big long podcast including Admiral and Bad-Conker as we talk about RPGs, Guitar Hero and serious some crazyness.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 7
item.description: Nick Rants something really depressive at the first 30 minutes proving that we really are the infaldel. However, guest star Mr. Plow comes and cheers Nick up, and the crazyness begins.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 6
item.description: We talk about the "so called" Revolution final name "Nintendo GO", review 3 DS games including a Japanese import, and get controversial with suductive video game consoles and teenage pregancy.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 5
item.description: We talk about PS3 + PSP, a bit about how Zelda Twilight Princess could use the Revolution controller, Corporation conspiracy, a bit about Shin Onimusha, celebraties who we would like to lynch, Nick's Mario Kart: Double Dash victorys, Alex's tin statue and another bitch about Bluray and HD-DVD (how... original...)

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 4
item.description: Nick has a brilliant game idea as we natter about Bust a Move DS, IGN having Revolution Dev kits, ranting about re-makes and talk about Nick's ego... And sorry about the Quality of the audio, we tried using a different mic, we'll never use it again!

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 3
item.description: We natter on about Family Guy the Video game, Genocide, Phone calls, Sci-fi, Conspiracy Theories and Alchemy. All round family fun, lol.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 2
item.description: We Talk about Revolution Dev kits and review ICO and Monkey Ball DS.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Series 1 - Episode 1
item.description: The First ever Official number 1 episode! finally got Nick, and... we end up losing the plot and talk bollocks for 45 mins. Lol. Enjoy!

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Pilot 2
item.description: Guess what, still no Nick! So I'll be rambling on again, this time prepared, and edited! 3 reviews; Guilty Gear Isuka, Castle Shikigami 2 and Electroplankton. Talk a bit about the DS lite and Tetris DS.

item.title: WAGJ Podcast Pilot 1
item.description: Here I am sitting on my own playing around with a piece of software called Audicity, the great and holy Nerdblurb inspired me to make my own podcast. Beware: it's so unscritped and there's a lot of buzz, did I also mention I recorded the TV with my mic? I'm such a dumb arse
